data.title: Deployment Recommendations

content.title: CNPG PostgreSQL Cluster
content.description: Cloud Native PostgreSQL with high availability, automated backups, and point-in-time recovery

content.title: Bitnami PostgreSQL Helm Chart
content.description: Simple PostgreSQL deployment using Helm, good for development environments

content.title: CrunchyData PGO
content.description: Enterprise-grade PostgreSQL Operator with advanced features

insights: CNPG is recommended for production workloads due to its HA capabilities
Consider your backup requirements when choosing between options
Bitnami chart is suitable for development and testing
